faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us by email for quick support.

items.title: Are all calculators completely free to use?
items.description: Yes! All our calculators are 100% free with no hidden fees, registration requirements, or usage limits. You can perform unlimited calculations on any of our tools.

items.title: How accurate are the calculations?
items.description: Our calculators use industry-standard formulas and algorithms. Each calculator is thoroughly tested for accuracy, but we recommend consulting professionals for critical financial or medical decisions.

items.title: Can I use these calculators on mobile devices?
items.description: Absolutely! All our calculators are fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices, tablets, and desktop computers. You can access them anywhere with an internet connection.

items.title: Do you store my calculation data?
items.description: No, we don't store your personal calculation data. All calculations are performed locally in your browser for privacy and security. We only collect anonymous usage statistics.

items.title: How often do you add new calculators?
items.description: We regularly add new calculators based on user requests and emerging needs. Follow us on social media or check back frequently to discover new tools.

items.title: Can I suggest a new calculator?
items.description: Yes! We welcome suggestions for new calculators. Contact us with your ideas, and we'll consider adding them to our growing collection of tools.
